title: Checking Coplanar Vectors Quiz
description: Test your ability to determine if three vectors are coplanar.

questions.question: What is the condition for three vectors to be coplanar?
questions.explanation: Three vectors are coplanar if their scalar triple product is zero.

questions.question: Are vectors a=(1,2,3), b=(4,5,6), c=(7,8,9) coplanar?
questions.explanation: The scalar triple product is zero, so they are coplanar.

questions.question: Which of these indicates that three vectors are linearly dependent?
options: Their scalar triple product is zero
questions.explanation: Linear dependence of three vectors is equivalent to their scalar triple product being zero.

questions.question: Can any two vectors be coplanar?
questions.explanation: Any two vectors always lie in the same plane, so they are always coplanar.

questions.question: What does a non-zero scalar triple product indicate?
questions.explanation: A non-zero scalar triple product means the vectors are linearly independent and span 3D space.
